Package realtimeweb.simplebusiness.exceptions

Exception Summary
AccountUnconfirmedException Indicates that the Yelp account has not yet been activated.
AreaTooLargeException Indicates that the geographical area is too large for this search request.
BusinessSearchException A generic exception thrown when there is an error with the Yelp service.
BusinessUnavailableException Indicates that there may not be able to provide details for certain businesses, for example if they don't have any reviews yet.
DataUnreadableException An exception thrown when the data received from a Yelp API call is unreadable.
DisconnectionException An exception thrown when a call to the online Yelp service fails, possibly because of a lost Internet connection.
ExceededReqsException Indicates that the number of requests executed for the given API key has exceeded its daily limit.
InternalErrorException Indicates an internal server error has occurred.
InvalidCredentialsException Indicates that the email/password for Yelp account authorization is invalid.
InvalidOAuthCredentialsException The request requires a user and the user specified is missing or invalid.
InvalidOAuthUserException Indicates that an input parameter is missing from the request.
InvalidParameterException Indicates that an input parameter value in the request is invalid.
InvalidSignatureException Indicates that the oauth_signature for the request is invalid.
MissingParameterException Indicates that an input parameter is missing from the request.
MultipleLocationsException Indicates that the given search location could not be disambiguated - that is, there were multiple possible locations, and the Yelp service which one you wanted!
PasswordTooLongException Indicates that the password for the Yelp account is too long.
UnavailableForLocationException Indicates that API requests are unavailable in the given location.
